protocol.name: P-G11119-1
protocol.text: Seeds were sterilised with sodium hypochlorite 5 min, 4 rinses sterile water,  plated on MS media, and incubated at 23Â°C under the continuous light conditions for 4 days.

protocol.name: P-G11119-2
protocol.text: Seeds were sterilised with sodium hypochlorite 5 min, 4 rinses sterile water,  plated on MS media, and incubated at 23Â°C under the continuous light conditions for 4 days.

protocol.name: P-G11119-3
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA was prepared from total RNA with GeneChip One-Cycle Target Labeling and Control Reagents (Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-G11119-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted with TRIzol (Invitrogen) and purified with RNeasy Micro Kit (QIAGEN).

protocol.name: P-G11119-5
protocol.text: Seeds were sterilised with sodium hypochlorite 5 min, rinsed 4 times with sterile water, plated on MS media, and incubated at 23Â°C under the continuous light conditions for 4 days.
